楰字的基本解释

楰
yú
古书上说的一种楸树，叶子大：“南山有构，北山有楰。”

楰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yú］
［《廣韻》羊朱切，平虞，以。］
［《廣韻》以主切，上麌，以。］
木名。苦楸。又名鼠梓。

楰字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楰； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页541第11
【唐韻】羊朱切【集韻】【韻會】容朱切【正韻】雲俱切，?音兪。【說文】鼠梓木。【詩·小雅】北山有楰。【草木疏】樹葉木理如楸，山楸之異者。亦名苦楸，濕時脃，燥時堅。【廣韻】鼠梓，似山楸而黑也。　又【唐韻】以主切【集韻】【韻會】【類篇】勇主切【正韻】偶許切，?音庾。義同。

楰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
楰字的起名意思

古书上说的一种楸树，叶子大。

tree
Basic explanation of words
tree
yú
A kind of catalpa tree in ancient books, with big leaves: "There are structures in the South Mountain, and the Catalpa in the North Mountain."
tree
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yú］
["Guangyun" Yang Zhuqie, Pingyu, to. ]
["Guangyun" is based on the main cut, on the top, with. ]
Wooden name. Acacia. Also known as Mouse Zi.
tree
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　楰; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 541 11
[Tang Yun] Sheep Zhu Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Rong Zhu Cut [Zheng Yun] Clouds are all cut,? Yin Yu. [Speaking text] Mouse Zimu. [Poetry·Xiaoya] There is a glutton in Beishan. 【Sparse vegetation】Leaves and woods are like catalpa, a different one from mountain catalpa. It is also known as Catalpa, when it is wet, it is hard when it is dry. [Guang Yun] Rat Zi, like catalpa but black.　[Tang Yun] and [Jiyun] [Rhyme Club] [Class Chapter] Brave Lord [Zhengyun] Occasionally Xu Qi,? Yin Yu. The same meaning.
